article_title: Local CPA Ready to Help in Face of Tough Tax Season
article_text:
Taxpayers may find the 2015 tax-filing season to be the most stress inducing in decades, due to both the Affordable Care Act and an under-equipped, short-staffed Internal Revenue Service.

As the tax season gets underway, CPA Joyce Bartlett settles ...
